definition: using the minimum of time or resources necessary for effectiveness
details:
adjective
- using the minimum of time or resources necessary for effectiveness
= example: using the minimum of time or resources necessary for effectiveness
= synonyms: economical
- financially rewarding
= example: financially rewarding
- concerned with worldly necessities of life, especially money
= example: concerned with worldly necessities of life, especially money
- of or relating to the science of economics
= example: of or relating to the science of economics
- of or relating to an economy, the system of production and management of material wealth
= example: of or relating to an economy, the system of production and management of material wealth
= synonyms: economical
